bug.author: saghiralfasly
bug.summary: Error: AttributeError: 'numpy.ndarray' object has no attribute 'pop'
bug.description: whenever i run training i get this error after a few steps File "/home/saghir/keras/ssd_keras/ssd_batch_generator.py", line 1177, in generate batch_inverse_coord_transform.pop(j) AttributeError: 'numpy.ndarray' object has no attribute 'pop' anyone know how to solve this

comments.comment: Thank you for pointing this out! Should be fixed with the latest commit, give it a try.
